org.trebor.swarmcon
Class OrbIo

java.lang.Object
  org.trebor.swarmcon.OrbIo

public class OrbIo
extends java.lang.Object

OrbIo provids all I/O between phycical orbs and the orb objects in this software as well as the joystick information. There will be one OrbIo object for all the orbs (one to rule them all). Messages from physical orbs are dispached to the correct orb object and joystick state is made available for orbs to read.
